languages.text: {n}Подозрение прорезается во взгляде навигатора.{/n} "На милую вещицу, которая убила целый корабль? Зачем? Я видел достаточно, чтобы не подпускать к ней никого более. Я жизнь положу, если надо, чтобы эта вещь больше никому не навредила".

{n}Suspicion mounts in Hann's eyes.{/n} "You want to see the trinket that nearly wiped out a whole ship? Why? I have seen enough to stop anyone else from coming anywhere near it. I will give my life, if I must, to prevent that thing from hurting any more people."
languages.original_text: {n}Подозрение прорезается во взгляде навигатора.{/n} "На милую вещицу, которая убила целый корабль? Зачем? Я видел достаточно, чтобы не подпускать к ней никого более. Я жизнь положу, если надо, чтобы эта вещь больше никому не навредила".

traits.locale_text: {n}Suspicion mounts in Hann's eyes.{/n} "At the trinket that nearly wiped out a whole ship? Why? I have seen enough to stop anyone else from coming anywhere near it. I will give my life, if I must, to prevent that thing from hurting any more people."

{n}Suspicion mounts in Hann's eyes.{/n} "At the trinket that nearly wiped out a whole ship? Why? I have seen enough to stop anyone else from coming anywhere near it. I will give my life, if I must, to prevent that thing from hurting any more people."

{n}Suspicion mounts in Hann's eyes.{/n} "You want to see the trinket that nearly wiped out a whole ship? Why? I have seen enough to stop anyone else from coming anywhere near it. I will give my life, if I must, to prevent that thing from hurting any more people."

{n}Suspicion mounts in Hann's eyes.{/n} "You want to see the trinket that nearly wiped out a whole ship? Why? I have seen enough to stop anyone else from coming anywhere near it. I will give my life, if I must, to prevent that thing from hurting any more people."

{n}Suspicion mounts in Hann's eyes.{/n} "You want to see the trinket that nearly wiped out a whole ship? Why? I have seen enough to stop anyone else from coming anywhere near it. I will give my life, if I must, to prevent that thing from hurting any more people."

languages.text: {n}ハンの目には疑惑が宿っている。{/n}「船一隻をほぼ全滅させかけた代物を見たい？なぜですか？あの恐ろしさは十分見ました…誰にも近づかせません。これ以上被害が広がるのを止めるためであれば、私は命を捧げる覚悟であります」
languages.original_text: {n}Suspicion mounts in Hann's eyes.{/n} "You want to see the trinket that nearly wiped out a whole ship? Why? I have seen enough to stop anyone else from coming anywhere near it. I will give my life, if I must, to prevent that thing from hurting any more people."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハンの目には疑惑が宿っている。{/n}「船一隻をほぼ全滅させかけた代物を見たい？なぜですか？あの恐ろしさは十分見ました…誰にも近づかせません。これ以上被害が広がるのを止めるためであれば、私は命を捧げる覚悟であります」

languages.text: {n}汉恩眼中充满了怀疑。{/n}“您想看看那个差点毁了整条船的小玩意儿？为什么？我再也不想看到我之前看到的惨状了。如果有必要的话，我愿意献出我的生命，阻止那东西伤害更多的人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Suspicion mounts in Hann's eyes.{/n} "You want to see the trinket that nearly wiped out a whole ship? Why? I have seen enough to stop anyone else from coming anywhere near it. I will give my life, if I must, to prevent that thing from hurting any more people."

traits.locale_text: {n}汉恩眼中充满了怀疑。{/n}“您想看看那个差点毁了整条船的小玩意儿？为什么？我再也不想看到我之前看到的惨状了。如果有必要的话，我愿意献出我的生命，阻止那东西伤害更多的人。”

languages.text: {n}La sospecha que ves en los ojos de Hann se intensifica.{/n} «¿Quiere ver el trasto que casi ha destruido una nave entera? ¿Por qué? Ya he visto suficiente como para impedir que nadie más se acerque a él. Si hace falta, daré la vida para impedir que esa cosa haga daño a alguien más».
languages.original_text: {n}Suspicion mounts in Hann's eyes.{/n} "You want to see the trinket that nearly wiped out a whole ship? Why? I have seen enough to stop anyone else from coming anywhere near it. I will give my life, if I must, to prevent that thing from hurting any more people."

traits.locale_text: {n}La sospecha que ves en los ojos de Hann se intensifica.{/n} «¿Quiere ver el trasto que casi ha destruido una nave entera? ¿Por qué? Ya he visto suficiente como para impedir que nadie más se acerque a él. Si hace falta, daré la vida para impedir que esa cosa haga daño a alguien más».

languages.text: {n}Hann vous observe d'un œil soupçonneux.{/n} « Vous voulez voir l'objet qui a bien failli anéantir un vaisseau tout entier ? Mais pourquoi ? J'en ai vu assez pour interdire à quiconque de s'en approcher. Je suis même prêt à donner ma vie pour empêcher cette chose de faire plus de victimes. »
languages.original_text: {n}Suspicion mounts in Hann's eyes.{/n} "You want to see the trinket that nearly wiped out a whole ship? Why? I have seen enough to stop anyone else from coming anywhere near it. I will give my life, if I must, to prevent that thing from hurting any more people."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hann vous observe d'un œil soupçonneux.{/n} « Vous voulez voir l'objet qui a bien failli anéantir un vaisseau tout entier ? Mais pourquoi ? J'en ai vu assez pour interdire à quiconque de s'en approcher. Je suis même prêt à donner ma vie pour empêcher cette chose de faire plus de victimes. »

languages.text: {n}In Hanns Blick zeigt sich Misstrauen.{/n} "Ihr wollt das Teil sehen, das fast ein ganzes Schiff ausgelöscht hätte? Warum? Ich habe genug gesehen, um alle anderen auf maximaler Distanz dazu zu halten. Ich werde mein Leben geben, falls nötig, um zu verhindern, dass das Ding noch mehr Menschen schadet."
languages.original_text: {n}Suspicion mounts in Hann's eyes.{/n} "You want to see the trinket that nearly wiped out a whole ship? Why? I have seen enough to stop anyone else from coming anywhere near it. I will give my life, if I must, to prevent that thing from hurting any more people."

traits.locale_text: {n}In Hanns Blick zeigt sich Misstrauen.{/n} "Ihr wollt das Teil sehen, das fast ein ganzes Schiff ausgelöscht hätte? Warum? Ich habe genug gesehen, um alle anderen auf maximaler Distanz dazu zu halten. Ich werde mein Leben geben, falls nötig, um zu verhindern, dass das Ding noch mehr Menschen schadet."

languages.text: {n}Hann'ın gözlerinde şüphe beliriyor.{/n} "Koca bir gemiyi neredeyse yok etmiş olan ziyneti mi görmek istiyorsunuz? Neden? Gördüğüm şeylerden sonra kimsenin ona yaklaşmasına müsaade edemem. O şeyin daha fazla kişiye zarar vermesinin önüne geçmek için gerekirse canımı veririm."
languages.original_text: {n}Suspicion mounts in Hann's eyes.{/n} "You want to see the trinket that nearly wiped out a whole ship? Why? I have seen enough to stop anyone else from coming anywhere near it. I will give my life, if I must, to prevent that thing from hurting any more people."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hann'ın gözlerinde şüphe beliriyor.{/n} "Koca bir gemiyi neredeyse yok etmiş olan ziyneti mi görmek istiyorsunuz? Neden? Gördüğüm şeylerden sonra kimsenin ona yaklaşmasına müsaade edemem. O şeyin daha fazla kişiye zarar vermesinin önüne geçmek için gerekirse canımı vermeye hazırım."
